subject: refactor: enhance theme with semantic status colors and improved borders
body:
- Add semantic status colors (success, error, warning, info) independent of theme accents
- Update border colors from #2C2C2C/#3C3C3C to #404040/#505050 for better visibility (2.1x/2.5x contrast)
- Enhance chat background pattern: primary blue at 4% opacity, 20px grid (more visible)
- Replace Tailwind default colors (red-600, green-600, gray-800) with themed equivalents in Toast, MessageActionSheet, and ReportMessageModal
- Update CLAUDE.md documentation with new theme structure and chat background pattern details

This refactor separates UI state colors from theme accent colors to prevent confusion and improves overall visual hierarchy.
title: enhance theme with semantic status colors and improved borders
